channel.title: Set every single npc's health

item.title: Set every single npc's health
item.dc:creator: @maxicube maxicube
item.description:
@maxicube wrote:

ok, i’m working on a command so when you type ::boom everything will die and not respawn (except players)
and I’ve got most of it goin, just not the NPC bit.

heres what I’ve made:

public void boom()
   {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
        client person = (client)p;
if(p != null) {
client castOn = (client)  
castOn.plrText = "ArRGH!!1!!11!!";
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.stillgfx(287, castOn.absY, castOn.	absX);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.currentHealth = 0;
castOn.updateRequired = true;

       }
}
}

thx in advance, maxicube[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2009, 04:58:49 pm[/size][hr]BUMP
